Homepage.premium_transport_service: Enjoy premium transportation service for your trips in and around Paris.
Homepage.luxury_features: Enjoy leather seats, adjustable air conditioning, ambient lighting, refreshing drinks, and gourmet snacks.
Homepage.airport_service_description: Enjoy a luxury private chauffeur service for your trips between airports and Paris.
Homepage.event_service_description: Make your event a special occasion with our event transportation service.
Homepage.payment_description: Enjoy transportation for your special occasions without worry with the option to pay in cash or by card, according to your preferences.
Homepage.whatsapp_contact: Contact us via WhatsApp to schedule your trip
Homepage.confirmation_details: Receive a confirmation of your booking with all the trip details.
Homepage.personalized_service_description: Enjoy personalized and quality service for all your trips.
Homepage.testimonial_example: Mourad provided an exceptional luxury chauffeur service. The vehicle was spotless and comfortable, and his driving was both smooth and professional.

Alert.error_less_150_characters: Your review must be less than 150 characters

TestimonialPage.you_can_consult_them: You can consult them and make your own opinions!
